components.description: A very small square shaded completely black. Notably smaller than the ⬛ Black Large Square, ◼️ Black Medium Square, and the ◾ Black Medium-Small Square.
components.title: Black Small Square

description: A very small square shaded completely black. Notably smaller than the ⬛ Black Large Square, ◼️ Black Medium Square, and the ◾ Black Medium-Small Square.
title: Black Small Square

version.description:
Unicode 1.1 were pre-dated emoji inclusion in Unicode by 17 years, and included many characters primarily sourced from the Zapf Dingbats font.

The following characters were added to Unicode in 1993 and many were given emoji presentation status in the years 2010-2015.

emoji_net_data.definition: Black Small Square was approved as part of Unicode 1.1 in 1993 and added to Emoji 1.0 in 2015. Copy and paste this emoji: Copy http://emojipedia.org/black-small-square/
emoji_net_data.name: black small square

bn:00111084a: Forming a right angle, especially at right angles with the mast or the keel, and parallel to the horizon; said of the yards of a square-rigged vessel when they are so braced.
Having four equal sides and four right angles or forming a right angle

apple_vendor_description: Apple’s black small square emoji is a perfectly formed, minimalist geometric shape, rendered with a deep, matte black finish that absorbs light, emphasizing its clean, sharp edges. On Apple devices, it maintains a subtle 3D presence with a hint of depth, ensuring it stands out clearly against any background. This versatile emoji is often employed for organizational purposes, to mark divisions in text, or to add a touch of understated visual structure to digital content.
